mapper.update: update kms_operate_log set audit_flag = 1 where log_id =#{logId}
mapper.insert: insert into kms_operate_archive_log (select * from kms_operate_log where operator_result=#{operatorResult} and operate_type = #{operateType} and operator_time between DATE_FORMAT(#{operateTimeBegin},'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%S')and DATE_FORMAT(#{operateTimeEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%S'))
